page.title: 17CHILHAM SCHOOL
page.content: The main school building at the school dates from 1860.Since then the school has been an all age school but at present has children from 5 to 11 years.There are today three separate school buildings. The main building has 2 classrooms, the office and School House.School House used to be a private house but it is now part of the school.The infants have a separate building across the playground and the juniors have a classroom in a converted barn above tne school kitchen and dining hall.There are two small playgrounds and an area of grass in the school garden which the children use.In 1985 there were about 100 children at the school, with four full time and one part time teacher. Six other adults are employed in various ways at the school.
